summary: This code counts the number of command line arguments, logs it twice, appends a string to the count variable and logs both again. Note that 'count++' is executed after the first log statement, so an additional 1 will be added to 'count' before logging it for the second time.

details.comment: This code counts the number of command line arguments, logs it twice, appends a string to the count variable and logs both again. Note that 'count++' is executed after the first log statement, so an additional 1 will be added to 'count' before logging it for the second time.
